user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable and supportive bras that are suitable for both active use and everyday wear, while also being affordable.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a comfortable and supportive option for medium-impact activities. The seamless design and soft material appealed to me, as I wanted something that would allow for full movement without discomfort. The price was also a significant factor, as I found it to be a bargain compared to typical plus-size bras, which made the quality even more surprising. Overall, the combination of comfort, support, and affordability led me to make this purchase.

I needed a soft and breathable bra that could keep up with my active lifestyle. The front close design and the brand's reputation for comfort and affordability were key factors in my decision. I appreciated the guarantee offered, which gave me confidence in the purchase. The comfort level was a priority for me, and I was pleased to find a product that met my needs without breaking the bank.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are comfortable, well-fitting, and made from high-quality materials. I value features such as stretchiness, breathability, and ease of maintenance, like being washable or having pockets. I appreciate items that are versatile and can be used in various settings, whether for lounging, exercising, or casual outings. Additionally, I tend to favor brands that offer good value for money and have a positive reputation for quality. On the other hand, I dislike products that are poorly sized, made from thin or low-quality materials, or that do not provide the comfort I expect. I also find excessive or unnecessary features unappealing, especially if they detract from the overall usability of the product.

conversation.content: I want to find comfortable and supportive bras that are versatile for both active use and everyday wear, all while staying within an affordable price range. within my expected price range: [10.25, 10.99]

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Womens Wireless Bra, Full-Coverage Pullover Stretch-Knit Bra, Smoothing T-Shirt Bra> / Item ID: B0BPCC1KBT / Price: $10.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["This wireless knit bra from Hanes® could easily become your favorite for all the ways in which it offers comfort and support. This pullover stretch bra is designed with strategic knit panels, placed to offer the support you need. The unlined cups offer natural shaping and sublime comfort, with that soft feel you love. This versatile style is made of the brand's ComfortFlex Fit® fabric with 4-way stretch that molds to your shape. Even better, this wirefree bra also features Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture to keep you cool and dry all day. Customers tell us they wear this T-shirt bra for low-impact workouts, including yoga, and that it's so comfortable they sometimes lounge and even sleep in it. With its built-up back and wide straps, this pullover bra offers smoothing all around, and is tagless for itch-free comfort."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <KINYAOYAO Women's Plus Size High Impact Seamless Racerback Padded Bra Yoga Bra> / Item ID: B0BGKP6L51 / Price: $10.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['Why KINYAOYAO Bras?', "Medium-Support Seamless Fitness Wire-free Bra are soft and supportive,it's stretchy and allows for full movement while wear it.Wide straps will never slide from shoulders and no need to adjust them.Great for home use and public.  NO UNI-BOOB.Soft,Seamless construction feels ultra smooth,Built for Medium-Impact activity and all-day comfort.Idea for exercising,weight training, or any sport.It's also a great lounging, yoga or leisure&sleep bra too.  Features:Pull On closure,Mid Support,Pullover Style Sports Bra,Removable cups,Bound edges,Encased elastic bottom band.  Available in different sizes,suitable for different body sizes women and girls to wear.  Wearing Cabeles sports bra while you do exercise can effectively help you gain chest support, stabilize your chest functions, prevent chest injury, and reduce 90 percent of your breast vibrations.Fashion,Sports,Health...Just for you.", 'Cabales Bras Size Chart', "We had completed 3000 questionnaires from our customers to show us the defects of our products' size info,quality of our products.Now we have improved the quality of our products and Modify size information to correct.Please check the size chart before you order it,thank you.  Reference size information:", 'Available in sizes 1X-5X. Size 1X Fit:36DD/36DDD/38B/38C/38D/40B/40C Size 2X Fit:38DD/380DDD/40C/40D/40DD/42B/42C/42D Size 3X Fit:40DDD/42D/42DD/42DDD/44B/44C/44D/44DD Size 4X Fit:42DD/42DDD/44D/44DD/44DDD/46B/46C/46D Size 5X Fit:46DD/46DDD/48C/48D/48DD/48DDD', 'NOTE:', 'The cross size means the 2 size are all fit for you,the smaller size fit well and a little snug but supportive.the larger one fit well and loosely.If you takes it as the sleep bra or nursing bras,the larger size will be better.If you have a plump chest or need a loosely experience,1 size larger was recommended."'] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Hanes Ultimate Underwire Bra, Low-Cut T-Shirt Bra, Convertible Underwire Bra, Convertible Underwire T-Shirt Bra> / Item ID: B0C3LS6FZX / Price: $10.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Say hello to smooth comfort with Hanes®' low-cut, underwire T-shirt bra. The T-shirt-soft knit fabric virtually disappears under clingy clothes for the smooth, seamless look you want. Offering moderate coverage, its plunging front contours will be welcomed by all the different necklines in your wardrobe. The underwire construction is super comfortable and detailed with a stretch front band that helps keep the cups in place. Lightly lined foam cups have inside concealing petals for a no-show look. You'll love the moisture-wicking properties of the soft knit ComfortBlend® lining that helps keep you cool and dry. And to top it all off, the straps convert from straight traditional to racerback styling for even more fashion flexibility. There are lots of reasons that this is one of Hanes' favorite underwire T-shirt bras."]
